title: sAdhu vibhAtamAgata (pv)
sahitya:
sAdhu vibhAtamAgata mayE mAdhava jAgrhi nanda nandana


anupallavi

  bOdhAkara parama puruSa ghana nIla bAdhitAsura jAla padmanAbha lOkEsha
			(svara sAhityam)
sAgara shayana pATala ruci mrdupada yugaLa cArurada gada sahOdara rajalaja samAnana 
vihaga turagA nakhahu hasa budhavasha sarasa madanasa drsha sumashara sAra shOka nAshana
C:  pApa vana dahana
			(svara sAhityAms)
1:  pAdatala nata sAdhu bhayahara 
2:  tApamiLitagada dhAraNAti caNa pArijAta sama ripu pavana bhujaga
3:  pAda munijana krpAlaya ruci raja pAda rasamadhika pAvana guNahata
pApa magadha nrpa pAshadhara girisha pAlana nija dhruti pATita madanaga
4:  sArasa bhava pariNuta tarasA shubha jAtamihAvaha sAmaja vara 
paripAlana bhrtarasa lOlava vanya mAlikA virAjita pashupa su drgamita 
dhruti hrti paTutara dAnava samudaya sAra bali mahita        


caraNam    pApa vana dahana pATita khaladhara bhUpAlaka nikara bhUri kAnti niTila
